BlackStorm/ELita/Ydrassil:

"Could you convince her to... return to our side? what happened with 
the program?"said Ydrassil. Elita was calming down and she started 
to smilling and gigled again while her little tail waved.

BlackStorm continued moved trying, Ydrassil looked her worried and 
looked at Rodimus waitting an answer.

>

decreasing
